lenders.occupational_info: I help others learn how to communicate better about their work, so they can get good jobs and succeed.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: My daughter got me started with a Mother's Day gift.  Great gift...Great daughter!

lenders.name: Jeffrey

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.occupational_info: I type and publish technical manuals to fix airplanes.

lenders.occupational_info: I am the mother of four children and I work part-time at a coffee shop.

lenders.name: Robert and Izzy
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to make a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: Signe

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a big company to help people do better in their work and feel happy about their work.

lenders.occupational_info: I am unable to work due to back injury.

lenders.occupational_info: We work with children so that they might reach their own potential.

lenders.name: Azule Navarre
lenders.loan_because: It is better to give a hand up than a hand out. We in the US are so blessed it is not only our privilege but our moral obligation to give back to those who have less.
lenders.occupational_info: I design websites.

lenders.name: LuAnn
lenders.loan_because: A relative gave me a gift certificate, The best gift I can imagine!
lenders.occupational_info: Branch Manager of Financial Institution. I provide education and help people achieve financial goals. I also farm. I raise sheep and grass hay.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is what Jesus would have me do.
lenders.occupational_info: primary school teacher

lenders.name: Margeaux

lenders.occupational_info: I help expand the charter school movement to provide better, high quality school options for children in California.

lenders.name: Dolf
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe in the power of being able to make other people's dreams of self reliance through owning their own business a reality.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with local people in Bali, Indonesia, creating opportunities for exporting local arts and crafts to the rest of the world.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: it's in my brother who passed away last October

lenders.name: Jessikah
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference. I want to help someone better their life and do good for themselves. I believe that the littlest things can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a server (waitress). It can be hard and frustrating at times, but can also be pretty fun at the same time.

lenders.name: anju
lenders.loan_because: i believe in helping others
lenders.occupational_info: to listen and find solutions for people

lenders.name: Mike & Kathy Storey
lenders.loan_because: we realize how fortunate we are to be Canadians. we want to make it possible for others to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: We belong to Rotary and our Rotary motto is service above self. This is one of the things that we can do to help make this a better world.

lenders.name: Nadege
lenders.loan_because:
it feels good to help needy people. Scientific studies have shown that spending money on others promotes happiness. Also because it is so easy to send money just by clicking; I'm to lazy and selfish to do more.
I managed to convince myself that I have more altruistic motives but this is probably  all confabulations.

lenders.name: Yuvaraja Subramaniam
lenders.loan_because: somebody needs a loan and I have been fortunate enough to have some money to lend
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software for an Investment bank

lenders.name: Efosa
lenders.loan_because: The only difference between meand someone living in poverty is the fact that I was born into affluence and they weren't. And I had absolutely nothing to do with that. Knowing this, how can I not?

lenders.name: Nutrition & Hunger 139
lenders.loan_because: Our student group at San Jose State cares about nutrition and we want to see these families given the opportunity to expand their nutritional resources.

are enrolled in Nutrition & Environmental Hunger (139)

lenders.name: Óttar
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I design biomass boilers

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: Most lasting changes start at the grassroots level.  Ending poverty means looking carefully at wealth.  If we have much and our neighbors have little, we are called on behalf of love to give to them.
lenders.occupational_info: Research to develop a vaccine or drug treatment for a parasite called leishmania

lenders.name: Marthinus en Sonja
lenders.loan_because: we want to make a better future for outselfes and others,we currently have a kitchen in a pub & grill that we are leasing from the owner ,we do good but we want to improve our services and give more work to those that does not have something to put on their tables for themselfes and their children - Thanks for your support - GOD BLESS
lenders.occupational_info: Long hours and Hard

lenders.name: Smári
lenders.loan_because: The idea of microfinance is an absurdly good one and I'm glad somebody managed to implement it in a relatively secure, relatively peer-to-peer way. I'll do what I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize projects regarding digital fabrication, peer-to-peer education and grassroots innovation in an attempt to break the current models of assumption that are manufacturing poverty and inequality on a global scale... amongst other things.

lenders.name: Kitty
lenders.loan_because: Our oldest son gave me a $25 certificate as a present one year and I have continued to lend it back, time after time.  Thank you for this opportunity!

lenders.name: Del
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and it is fun to watch people succeed!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage 8 Estate Wineries in Canada.  We specialize in Icewine.

lenders.name: Jeannette
lenders.loan_because: Kiva offers an amazing way to fight poverty through peer-to-peer microloans. Genius!
lenders.occupational_info: Scribe Marketing, Inc., offers a creative, critical approach to marketing with an emphasis on quality content.

lenders.name: Vivian
lenders.loan_because: When I was younger I worked very hard to better the lives of women in my own country.  But it was always my wish to also reach out to  women in other countries, I just was never sure how to best do so.  I was so happy to hear of this organization on the radio, just what I had in mind.  Thank you so much for creating such a wonderful organization. I know how much of yourselves you put into it.

lenders.name: Tisha
lenders.loan_because: sometimes we all need a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: Down to earth and artsy- glass, clay, and gardening.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people setting up and expanding their business.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software for chess tournaments.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I feel we all need to give back in any way we can, be it big or small.

lenders.name: Shari
lenders.loan_because: I don't have the time (or money!) available to go to somewhere like Honduras, Kenya, or Senegal to help with someone's pickling, plumbing, or textile business myself. Making a loan makes helping out easy.
lenders.occupational_info: Writing, typing, scribbling, etc.

lenders.name: KansasKate
lenders.loan_because: I can.  And you can, too.

lenders.name: margaret
lenders.loan_because: My sister invited me to this website and inspired me, and I believe in helping people - especially women - improve their lives and their family's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with teachers - we help one another become even better at getting students at our school to learn and grow.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: Growing up myself in a developing beautiful country island such as the Dominican Republic i know the struggles and sacrifices that underprivileged and dedicated families go through to feed and support their own. I also find that my good deeds are always repaid double somehow. And it also makes me feel that I have contributed in someway in bettering this sometimes unkind world we all live in, even if it's only a little bit at a time.

lenders.name: zenith
lenders.loan_because: I have been truly blessed in my life and would like to share my good fortune.  It also provides a good example in helping my children grow into compassionate and individuals.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little to change someone's life.

lenders.name: Autumn
lenders.loan_because: I feel micro-credit loans provide great opportunites for people in harsh living conditions, from people who have money to spare. It also creates valuable connections between people located all over the world.

lenders.name: Kit
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Manage customer service people at a water utility company in California, USA.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to have a spare $25 every now and then.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a starving graduate student. If I have $25 here and there, anyone does.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I don't have much money to help others. With KIVA, my contribution, combined with the conributions of others, can make a real difference in a person's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach World History and World Geography to 14, 15, and 16 year old high school students.

lenders.name: Teppei
lenders.loan_because: I want to see improving business and happy.

lenders.name: Dolores
lenders.loan_because: My family and I are very fortunate to have the means to be able to help others.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I believe in providing people the means to pull themselves out of poverty if they're prepared to work. And I know life can be very tough so I'm happy if I can be of help. All the best in your enterprises!
lenders.occupational_info: I run development teams providing  specialised software for the financial markets.

lenders.name: Marysol
lenders.loan_because: I believe that businesses help improve a country's economy by providing for income, jobs, expansion, etc.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at the MGM Grand Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA. I take the hotel phone calls and transfer to the correct departments/guests.

lenders.loan_because: The more jobs created the more people lifted from poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Presently retired. Television/advertising executive

lenders.name: Bess & Milagro
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a secretary, but I am studying to become a Math and Spanish teacher.

lenders.name: Lesley
lenders.loan_because: It is one way to make a difference to a community, and to promote education.    And it is a way of giving thanks.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I've been very lucky in my life, spread the love even if it's a little at a time and to who you choose.

lenders.name: Faleaana
lenders.loan_because: We should all have a servant's heart :)
lenders.occupational_info: Office job...enough said

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to provide medical care to sick and injured people in emergency situations.

lenders.name: Deja
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who are trying to support their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I help kids stay out of trouble and hold them accountable for their actions.

lenders.name: patricia
lenders.loan_because: inspiration and empowerment is contagious

lenders.name: sisters hairdressing
lenders.loan_because: professional am a hairdresser am ust doing it in my house in mombasa and am trying to find ashop but it expensive with family to raise .i bought a sewing machine to help me with some money and tried to purchase some equipment it helps.anyway am trying to open my own shop and train people .like droupouts and women .this my goal.
lenders.occupational_info: am a a hairdresser for 10 years doing it in the house and planning to get a shop and some dryers and styling chairs and sinks.to start a class and train young generation and women .i bought already a sewing machine and trying to buy more and train young girls too how to sew so they can develop in themselves.

lenders.name: Rick & Liz
lenders.loan_because: this is a wonderful way to help hard-working people in other parts of the world.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: If you are not part of the solution, you  are part of the problem.

lenders.name: Ferdie & Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: We wish to help others that are not so fortunate, so that they can achieve something more for themselves.It is our responsibilty to lift and help one another.
lenders.occupational_info: Automotive Business

lenders.name: Damien
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with abundance. Tikkun alam.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a daily newspaper journalist since 1968.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good to help people who are working so hard and just need a little boost.  We've all needed a boost in our lives at some time.
lenders.occupational_info: I am spending time recuperating from an illness and moving from one house to another.  I have just sent my fifth child off to college - three are now on their own and two are still in school.  I am the proudest mother of all!  Family is very important.

lenders.name: Abdulla
lenders.loan_because:
An-Nisa (Women)
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
O mankind! Be careful of your duty to your Lord Who created you from a single soul and from it created its mate and from them twain hath spread abroad a multitude of men and women. (QURAN CHAPTER 4: Verse 1)... if we were all created from a single soul..then we are all ONE...
lenders.occupational_info:
give a little back (ita not yours after all)
you owe it to you brothers and sisters
we all need a lending hand
to make the world a better place

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: Anytime I think I am struggling, I realize I have it so much better than so many people.  My giving up the cost of one meal out to help another person survive is an amazing opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with banks to create reports about their customers and their accounts.

lenders.name: Trinh & Van Anh
lenders.loan_because:
"This could be me in another life
In another set of circumstances"
lenders.occupational_info: Delivering smiles

lenders.name: Marg Swan Shulman
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate and want to share some of what I have with other hard working individuals.  I hope that I can help them achieve their goals just like I did.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves and to follow the example of the man who won the Nobel Prize for starting the micro-loan business in India.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and do a little publishing of books for young people and  also create sculptures.

lenders.name: Tim & Aubrey
lenders.loan_because: access to capital is essential to relieving poverty!

lenders.name: Leena
lenders.loan_because: God blesses us so that we share his abundance. Whatever I give I always get back in many ways--that is how the world was intended to work :)

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: Access to capital from Foreign Direct Investment allows individuals help themselves without government beauracracy and corruption.  The more people are able to stand on their own through markets and rule of law, subnational violence and transnational terrorism will disappear.  This would achieve my goal of world piece with the Pentagon as a museum that the world would visit as a memorial for all who have sacraficed for a better tomorrow.
lenders.occupational_info: I loan for deserving, hardworking individuals desiring change for themselves, their family, their country, and the world.

lenders.name: Endurance
lenders.loan_because: no one controls their initial endowment but we can all shape our future. As I continue to learn more about this plight of life I realize it is my duty to help and my gift to give. It is not someone else's problem; It is our shared dilemma. One that, through religion, color, or ideal will bring us together; as the same God watches over all of us.
lenders.occupational_info: I do this very thing everyday. I lend money to people. I work for a bank. It is a desk job. I don't see the sun for a majority of the day or breathe fresh air. I look at a computer screen and do math on people and companies to try and figure out if they have the necessary cash flow and integrity to repay loaned money. It is not physically-demanding only mentally draining.

lenders.name: Nadia ML
lenders.loan_because: it empowers motivated individuals to follow their dreams and become financially self-sufficient, which in turn strengthens entire families, communities and eventually, our world.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense to support micro businesses in poverty stricken areas of the world.

lenders.name: Britt
lenders.loan_because: Our class raised money for kiva.org by hosting a silent auction where we sold murals that we made which depicted the world.  We want to help people improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Our class focuses on service learning because through this we are able to have a greater understanding of other communities and cultures, it helps give us a greater global sense.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell houses.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: of Jesus.
lenders.occupational_info: preaching Jesus.  comforting the afflicted, afflicting the comfortable.

lenders.name: Juan
lenders.loan_because:
i am a certified English teacher. Learning English has been my passion since I was a child, and my interests kept growing as traveling to many countries.
I visited many developped countries and I realized that there are many things we could improve here in Peru. Peru is a beautiful country filled with riches and natural resources although there is a lot of poverty here. My dream is to make a living and at the same time helping others improving Education, Hygiene,etc
As an English educator and other languages as well.

lenders.name: Zusatzveranstaltung Eng
lenders.occupational_info: We would like to show friends of us, how easy it is to support entrepreneurs from all over the world, especially from less developed countries, to empowering them to lift themselfs out of poverty. We ask you for a small donation of less than 1 Euro, which we will be collecting and transfering it up to our Kiva's account.

lenders.name: Lene
lenders.occupational_info: Single mom - 2 children aged 14 and 16

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I beleive everyone should have the opportunity to make dreams a reality.  I have been afforded the opportunity of education and a good job to support my family.  I wish to give others the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a college and have the privelage/opportunity to watch young minds expand in their thinking and open up to new information and opportunities.

lenders.name: swamp3r
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help out and know that your money is directly helping an individual achieve their goals/dreams.

lenders.name: Karin Wells
lenders.loan_because: I have enough to meet my needs and am glad to be able to share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint pictures. You can see them at http://www.KarinWells.com and also at http://www.Oilpnt.com

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: it is better than a gift....a  loan provides an  incentive  to succeed in business.  Like  the pooled  investments, microfinancing , ability to help women in particular.
lenders.occupational_info: I  no longer work  for pay, but I spent  many years helping  people  figure out how computers  could help them in their businesses.

lenders.name: Brianne
lenders.loan_because: As a citizen of the United States, it's my responsibility.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I want to provide an opportunity for others to be able to succeed and hopefully, this shall encourage them to help other people in return.
lenders.occupational_info: I am part of a team that provides engineering operations support to a local critical care hospital.

lenders.name: Maja
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people in a worthy way without making them feel ashamed or too thankful for what is little for me. They should achieve what they work for.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for a newspaper. I write texts about what happens in my city and the region where I live - which is Northern Germany. I also work for a regional radio station.

lenders.name: Moira and Allan
lenders.loan_because: We first heard of Kiva when we were given a gift certificate.  We like this way of supporting entrepreneurs as we can follow their progress and share in their success  as they show how their businesses are working through their ability to pay back their loan and so make it available for someone else.  We believe this is an empowering way of supporting small business people in challenging circumstances and we can also learn something about them and their situation too.  We all are winners!

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: i makes some music!!

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher Training.

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: I want to help out

lenders.name: Faith
lenders.loan_because: Everyday I wake in the morning only thinking of myself. One day I woke up and wondered what the world would be like if everyone cared for others. I got this kiva gift certificate and thought this is a wonderful way to give back. I hope this dotation will help you.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Pareto would be proud.  Nobody loses here.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the daily and longer term affairs of the Town and Villages within it.

lenders.name: Gaby
lenders.loan_because: This has got to be one of the best causes I've ever seen.
lenders.occupational_info: I help entrepeneurs, in a way. If they invent something, I make sure they get a patent for it. :)

lenders.name: Kithanae
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people.  I know I'm doing a lot better than many other people out there, and I'm willing to do what I can to make others lives easier.
lenders.occupational_info: I wear a suit, and sell investments.  It's very boring!

lenders.loan_because:
I want to help others who farm,

lenders.name: Linda

lenders.occupational_info: I STAY HOME & USE MY TIME TO KNIT, GARDEN & VOLUNTEER

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those persons who suffer true poverty.  Not the North American Style, whereby we suffer from life style choices and have abilities to change.
lenders.occupational_info: I own two Employment Agencies, one employment newspaper and a HR Consulting firm.  I believe that new immigrants to Canada should have an opportunity to thrive from the beginning of their journey of making Canada their home!

lenders.name: chrissy
lenders.loan_because: jesus would
lenders.occupational_info: i try to do stuff jesus would do in buffalo, ny.!

lenders.name: Derrick
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of the ripple effect.

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: My parents won't let me join the Peace Corps.
lenders.occupational_info: Some of us blonds are smart ya know?

lenders.name: Jacquelyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to give a hand up, not a hand out.

lenders.name: Andrea Ævars
lenders.loan_because:
I want the world to be a better place and I believe that what goes around, comes around.

I also want the world to be a better place where my sons can have a happy life.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a university student, specializing in library and information science.
I'm also heathen and proud of it :)

lenders.name: Katya
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because I can. 
Here in our rich, material societies we often take for granted the value of what we have and what we have to give...I want my children to grow up with an appreciation for the wider scope.
lenders.occupational_info: I have recently left my job as a retail manager (selling clothes and managing a clothing store) to raise my newborn son (who will be due this year in June).

lenders.name: Aeron
lenders.loan_because: I'm a small business owner/do-it-yourselfer as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint paintings in watercolor and oil of landscapes and the beautiful scenery around Virginia.  I also train horses and rescue horses in need and fix them up and find them good homes.

lenders.name: Pete
lenders.loan_because: I feel that it is so much more empowering to loan people money to build self-sustaining ventures than it is to just give money to solve an immediate need.  I think Kiva is an incredible program.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small business owners in the U.S. decide what they really want, make plans to reach these goals, and then overcome all the obstacles they face while executing their plan.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I admire the strength and drive of the entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a team of people who work to keep our country safe.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who have a vision for improving their life.  It's personally motivating to see and read about others around the world that will not let any obstacles block them from achieving their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the computer industry and work with a team that manages a large number of web servers.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: It is a privilege to help people have better lives.

lenders.name: MBG & Mindy Millington
lenders.loan_because: I have needed a helping hand before, and I know what it is like to just need a little more capital to become successful.  God has given me and my family so much, I like to give back when I can.
lenders.occupational_info:
I Custom Design Websites and I help individuals get started in a home based business online and offline.

If anyone would like to work from home using their computers with no risk, please visit  www.GoFearless.com.

lenders.name: Francesca
lenders.loan_because: My sister gave me this $25 to spend on your site. I love the idea of it and look forward to seeing it's impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher of 4year old children. Most of my students come from Haiti. I like the idea that I am helping a haitian woman start a business.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world, and this is a simple yet effective way to help people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a full time student, as well as a part time cashier.

lenders.name: Cindi
lenders.loan_because: The amount of money wasted in developed nations is obscene, and I want to do what I can.

lenders.name: Olivia
lenders.loan_because: God has been good to me, and I want to share that with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend my weekdays with 130 of my favorite people.

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: I like to see entrepreneurs succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am going to school to learn how to help the elderly stay active.

lenders.name: Sergio
lenders.loan_because: A little bit from me makes a huge difference to someone else in the world that doesn't have the luck that I have living in the US.  In my life 25 bucks disappears in seconds...and I don't remember what happened to it.  That same amount will help someone improve their life hopefully in a meaningful way.  Every little bit helps.  Many of us can give up 25 bucks every every so often and not feel the pinch.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a photographer that shoots travel, extreme adventure sports and outdoor lifestyle.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Laura

lenders.name: Gary & Crew
lenders.loan_because: Well...  "Life is full of suffering (spiritually and physically)... Suffering is caused by desire and ignorance... However, suffering can be eliminated through four  tools; hard work (effort), mediation (prayer), understanding (study), and compassion (No one said liberation would be easy)... In daily practice keep in mind "You will reap what you sow... Either here in the present, or in the afterlife."   and  because we should all help each other... "Under the bright sun, many of us are gathered together with different languages, different styles of dress, even different faiths. However, all of us are the same in being humans, and we all uniquely have the thought of I, and we´re all the same in wanting happiness and in wanting to avoid suffering."
